title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing Ok after setting the output location and classpath, the following error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The issue arises because setting the output location and classpath are currently treated as two separate operations, resulting in an illegal state being created.
EB: When changing the project properties to use the project as the source folder and output location, the software should correctly handle the classpath and output location as a single operation to avoid creating an illegal state.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the settings menu.
2. Navigate to the classpath configuration.
3. Set the desired output location.
4. Set the classpath.
5. Press the Ok button.
6. Observe the error message 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'.
